Take-home Exercise 1

Creating data visualisation beyond default

Published

January 15, 2023

The Task

In this take-home exercise, you are required to apply the skills you had learned in Lesson 1 and Hands-on Exercise 1 to reveal the demographic of the city of Engagement, Ohio USA by using appropriate static statistical graphics methods. The data should be processed by using appropriate tidyverse family of packages and the statistical graphics must be prepared using ggplot2 and its extensions.

Survival Tip

Start with Participants data file in the Attributes folder.

Submission Instructions

This is an individual assignment. You are required to work on the take-home exercises and prepare submission individually.

  • The take-home exercise submission must be written by using distill for R Markdown. It can be in either distill article or distill blog format. You are required to publish the exercise on Netlify and provide the link on the take-home exercise submission page on elearn.
  • You are also required to push the take-home exercise folder and data onto your individual Github repository and provide the link on the take-home exercise submission page on eLearn.

Submission date

Your completed take-home exercise is due on 24th April 2022, by 11:59pm evening.

  • Singapore’s Demographic Composition Across Time
